Generation IV.Diamond: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
Generation IV.Pearl: It is thought that Uxie , Mesprit and Azelf all came from the same egg.
Generation IV.Platinum: When Azelf flew, people gained the determination to do things. It was the birth of willpower.
Generation IV.HeartGold: This Pokémon is said to have endowed humans with the determination needed to face any of life's difficulties.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: This Pokémon is said to have endowed humans with the determination needed to face any of life's difficulties.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pokémon manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into puppets of its own.
